const RegistrationForm = () => { const [activeButton, setActiveButton] = useState('user'); const clickHandler = (e) => { setActiveButton(e.target.value); } (function() { 'use strict'; window.addEventListener('load', function() { // Fetch all the forms we want to apply custom Bootstrap validation styles to var forms = document.getElementsByClassName('needs-validation'); // Loop over them and prevent submission var validation = Array.prototype.filter.call(forms, function(form) { form.addEventListener('submit', function(event) { if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } form.classList.add('was-validated'); }, false); }); }, false); })(); return (
